refentry:
$Date$ $Revision$
elements seealsoie seealsoie Element
seealsoie &seealsoie.purpose;
&seealsoie.synopsis.gen; Description
SeeAlsoIE identifies a See also cross-reference in an IndexEntry. IndexEntrys occur in an Index, not in the flow of the text. They are part of a formatted index, not markers for indexing.
Processing expectations
&format.block; IndexEntrys that include a SeeAlsoIE should be formatted normally, with the See also indented below the term.
SeeAlsoIE is usually expected to generate the text See Also.
The Linkends attribute should point other IndexEntrys in the same Index. Online systems may use them to form hypertext links.
&FutureChanges;
&fu.interfacedefinition;
&seealsoie.parents.gen; &seealsoie.children.gen;
Attributes
linkends
Linkends points to a the related IndexEntrys.
See Also &seealsoie.seealso.gen;
Examples
For examples, see &seealsoie.example.seealso.gen;.
